round_best: Develop an AI system that simulates human-like saccadic movements to improve the understanding of visual relations among objects. By programming the AI to mimic the patterns of quick, simultaneous eye movements performed by humans when scanning unfamiliar scenes, the system can build dynamic spatial maps of unseen objects and learn to contextualize them relative to known objects. This method would allow the AI to incrementally learn and update its database of object relations through an iterative process akin to human visual learning.
